# vfs_isrdwr

**Function**

Determine if a filesystem is mounted with writes enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
int vfs_isrdwr(mount_t mp);
```

## Parameters

- **mp**: Mount to test.

## Return Value

Nonzero if filesystem is mounted read-write, else 0.
title: vfs_isrdwr
